com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.identifier.IndexingIdentifiers

    • Uses of IndexingIdentifiers in com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.database

      Classes in com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.database that implement IndexingIdentifiers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Databases
      Helper class for building database restrictions, such as those used in the databasematch parameter of a query.

    • Uses of IndexingIdentifiers in com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.identifier

      Subinterfaces of IndexingIdentifiers in com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.identifier 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DocumentIdentifiers
      DocumentIdentifiers can be used to identify documents in a query or getcontent action, as well as in a DREREPLACE.
      interface  QueryIdentifiers
      QueryIdentifiers are document identifiers that can be used to filter a query action using a 'match' parameter, such as matchreference or statematchid.
      Fields in com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.identifier declared as IndexingIdentifiers 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IndexingIdentifiers IndexingIdentifiers.ALL
      IndexingIdentifier to represent DREALL, which can be reused to replace fields on all the documents in an engine.

    • Uses of IndexingIdentifiers in com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.identifier.id

      Subinterfaces of IndexingIdentifiers in com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.identifier.id 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Ids
      A representation of a set of document ids.
      Classes in com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.identifier.id that implement IndexingIdentifiers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractIds
      An abstract base-class that partially implements the Ids interface using sensible defaults.
      class  Id
      A representation of a document id.
      class  IdsBuilder
      A builder class for aggregating multiple ids into a single object.

    • Uses of IndexingIdentifiers in com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.identifier.stateid

      Classes in com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.identifier.stateid that implement IndexingIdentifiers

      An abstract base-class that partially implements the StateIds interface using sensible defaults.
      class  StateId
      A representation of a stored state id.
      class  StateIdsBuilder
      A builder class for aggregating multiple state ids into a single object.
